hero.heading: 小天也
hero.intro:
Welcome to my blog -sharing thoughts on tech, development, and life.

Do not go gentle into that good night,
不要温和地走进那个良夜，

Old age should burn and rave at close of day;
老人在日落时应当燃烧、怒吼；

Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
怒斥、怒斥那光明的消歇。
